tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE MarketingMessages (  message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,  message_content VARCHAR(255),  location_id INT,  location_name VARCHAR(100) )

CREATE TABLE marketing_messages (
    message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    message_text TEXT,
    target_city VARCHAR(255),
    target_state VARCHAR(255),
    target_country VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    city VARCHAR(255),
    state VARCHAR(255),
    country VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    city VARCHAR(100),
    state VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE marketing_campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL(10, 2),
    targeting_location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE location_data (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(255),
    country VARCHAR(100),
    city VARCHAR(100),
    region VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    conversion_rate DECIMAL(5, 2),
    revenue DECIMAL(12, 2)
);
